definition: a small float usually made of cork, to stuff with cork
details:
noun
- a small float usually made of cork
= synonyms: bob
- the plug in the mouth of a bottle (especially a wine bottle)
= synonyms: bottle cork
- outer bark of the cork oak
- (botany) outer tissue of bark
= synonyms: phellem
verb
- to stuff with cork
= example: to stuff with cork
- to close a bottle with a stopper
= example: to close a bottle with a stopper
= synonyms: cork up
